txt.en:
The Hornburg is all that prevents the fall of Rohan. Aragorn stands defiant upon the ramparts of the gate-house.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Soldier defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Commander defeated
- Banner burned
Aragorn and Legolas must survive the battle
The Hornburg is the final layer of Rohan's defences at Helm's Deep. If it falls, then all hope is lost.
